original_text: They taught throughout Judah, taking with them the Book of the Law of the Lord; they went around to all the towns of Judah and taught the people.
korean_text: 그들이 여호와의 율법책을 가지고 유다에서 가르치되 그 모든 유다 성읍들로 두루 다니며 백성들을 가르쳤더라

sentences.original_text: taking with them the Book of the Law of the Lord
they went around to all the towns of Judah
